item.title: By: Matt Wiebe
item.dc:creator: Matt Wiebe
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/05/30/hashbang-urls/#comment-3717">Joseph Scott</a>.
Yup, it does. I wish, at minimum, it defaulted to off rather than on for WP.com blogs.
The homepage for an OnSwipe'd blog is also essentially a splash page.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joseph Scott.

Yup, it does. I wish, at minimum, it defaulted to off rather than on for WP.com blogs.

The homepage for an OnSwipe’d blog is also essentially a splash page.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/05/30/hashbang-urls/#comment-3716">Matt Wiebe</a>.
Is OnSwipe using hashbang URLs? I don't have an iPad so I haven't tried it. I'll see what I can dig up.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Matt Wiebe.

Is OnSwipe using hashbang URLs? I don’t have an iPad so I haven’t tried it. I’ll see what I can dig up.

item.title: By: Matt Wiebe
item.dc:creator: Matt Wiebe
item.description:
<blockquote> Hashbang URLs can not go away fast enough. Please work to wipe them off the web and then pretend it never happened.</blockquote>
Then, might I suggest you convince your employer to get rid of that OnSwipe theme for iPad? I cringe every time I see it come up.
item.content:encoded:
Hashbang URLs can not go away fast enough. Please work to wipe them off the web and then pretend it never happened.

Then, might I suggest you convince your employer to get rid of that OnSwipe theme for iPad? I cringe every time I see it come up.
